caption: Table 2: Evaluation on COCO val2017 (object detection & instance segmentation) and ADE20K (semantic segmentation).
description: Table 2 presents quantitative results of object detection, instance segmentation, and semantic segmentation on COCO val2017 and ADE20K benchmarks.

caption: Table 3: Ablation results on DIV2K-Val, COCO val2017 and ADE20K for DreamClear.
description: Table 3 presents the ablation study results of DreamClear model on DIV2K-Val, COCO val2017, and ADE20K datasets, showing the effect of different components on the performance.

caption: Table 4: Ablations for GenIR on LSDIR-Val using SwinIR-GAN.
description: The table presents a quantitative comparison of image restoration metrics on the LSDIR-Val dataset using SwinIR-GAN trained with different datasets, including the pre-trained T2I model and the proposed GenIR.
